content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The restaurant has valet at a reasonable price of only $4. My date made. Our reservation for 6pm and they seated had right away. The waiters know their menu very well and are very strive and patient. The food is a whole experience! I don't think there was anything I didn't like. The ambience there is low light , intimate , tables are small, the restaurant itself is very small but they do have a table for a larger party.
